price: 44. Zij zeiden: “Vermengde valse dromen en wij hebben geen kennis in het uitleggen van dromen.”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمٖۖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحۡلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū aḍghāthu aḥlāmin wamā naḥnu bitawīli al-aḥlāmi biʿālimīna
